access: Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Undead Compendium](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1576)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 91</row>

**Price** 6,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The best minds among the Magaambyan, Iomedaean, and Pharasmin Knights of Lastwall joined together to create these small, leather-bound journals. While you're holding an _undead compendium_, the information it contains slips into your mind, granting you a +2 item bonus to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) checks to obtain information about [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures.

<document level="2" id="action-1190" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
